actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to provide representation to Senate deponents in Rose Hall, Ltd., et al. v. Chase Manhattan Overseas Banking Corp. and Holiday Inns, Inc., C.A. No. 79-182.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent certain Senators or Senate employees in proceedings concerning subpoenas in the case of Rose Hall, Ltd., et al. v. Chase Manhattan Overseas Banking Corp. and Holiday Inns, Inc.

titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to provide representation to Senate deponents in Rose Hall, Ltd., et al. v. Chase Manhattan Overseas Banking Corp. and Holiday Inns, Inc., C.A. No. 79-182.
